TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit ConstructorInfo extends System.Reflection.MethodBase implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._ConstructorInfo
Public MustInherit Class ConstructorInfo Inherits MethodBase Implements _ConstructorInfo
public ref class ConstructorInfo abstract : System::Reflection::MethodBase, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_ConstructorInfo
type ConstructorInfo = class inherit MethodBase interface _ConstructorInfo

summary.span: Discovers the attributes of a class constructor and provides access to constructor metadata.

span.span: Discovers the attributes of a class constructor and provides access to constructor metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ConstructorInfo` 用來探索的建構函式以及對於叫用建構函式的屬性。`ConstructorInfo` is used to discover the attributes of a constructor as well as to invoke a constructor. 物件會藉由呼叫上`ConstructorInfo`傳回由或是方法物件。Objects are created by calling on a `ConstructorInfo` returned by either the or method of a object. > [!NOTE] > 繼承自數個成員，例如，可用來檢查泛型方法。 inherits from several members, such as , that can be used to examine generic methods. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版的建構函式不可以是泛型，因此這些成員會傳回`false`或`null`。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 constructors cannot be generic, so these members return `false` or `null`. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`ConstructorInfo`具有和來尋找符合指定的搜尋準則的建構函式。The following example uses `ConstructorInfo` with and to find the constructors that match the specified search criteria. [!code-cpp[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/CPP/type_getconstructor3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/CS/type_getconstructor3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/VB/type_getconstructor3.vb#1)]

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個類別無法繼承由部分信任的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

span.span: This type is thread safe.

span.para: 當您繼承自，您必須覆寫下列成員多載： 。
When you inherit from , you must override the following member overload: .

param.span: An array of values that matches the number, order and type (under the constraints of the default binder) of the parameters for this constructor.

summary.span: Invokes the constructor reflected by the instance that has the specified parameters, providing default values for the parameters not commonly used.

span.span: Invokes the constructor reflected by the instance that has the specified parameters, providing default values for the parameters not commonly used.

returns.span: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.

span.span: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數字、 類型和順序中的項目`parameters`陣列應該與數目、 類型和此執行個體所反映的建構函式參數的順序相同。The number, type, and order of elements in the `parameters` array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance. 然後再呼叫建構函式，`Invoke`可確保呼叫端的存取權，並確認參數是否有效。Before calling the constructor, `Invoke` ensures that the caller has access permission and verifies that the parameters are valid. 完全信任程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可存取，而且完全受信任的程式碼時，使用反映來叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. > [!NOTE] > 若要建立沒有執行個體建構函式實值類型的執行個體，請使用方法。To create an instance of a value type that has no instance constructors, use the method. 這個方法是很便利的方法，下列多載版本，請使用預設值。This method is a convenience method for the following overloaded version, using default values. 無法覆寫這個方法。This method cannot be overridden. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用成員的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數字、 類型和順序中的項目`parameters`陣列應該與數目、 類型和此執行個體所反映的建構函式參數的順序相同。The number, type, and order of elements in the `parameters` array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance. 然後再呼叫建構函式，`Invoke`可確保呼叫端沒有存取權限，以及參數是否正確數目、 順序和型別。Before calling the constructor, `Invoke` ensures that the caller has access permission and that the parameters are of the correct number, order and type. 完全信任程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可存取，而且完全受信任的程式碼時，使用反映來叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. > [!NOTE] > 若要建立沒有執行個體建構函式實值類型的執行個體，請使用方法。To create an instance of a value type that has no instance constructors, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，這個方法可以用來存取非公用成員，如果呼叫者已授與使用旗標，並限制為呼叫端的非公用成員的授權集是否授與集或子集效果。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用這項功能，您的應用程式應將目標設為 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] (含) 以後版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

summary.span: Gets a value indicating that this member is a constructor.

span.span: Gets a value indicating that this member is a constructor.

value.span: 值，表示這個成員為建構函式。

span.span: A value indicating that this member is a constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會覆寫。This property overrides . 因此，當您檢查一組物件，例如，將所傳回的陣列—屬性會傳回只有指定的成員時，建構函式。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects — for example, the array returned by — the property returns only when a given member is a constructor. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來識別物件做為建構函式。The following example uses the property to identify a object as a constructor. [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是用於存取 managed 類別，並不會呼叫從 managed 程式碼。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需詳細資訊`IDispatch::Invoke`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
